body: The output of size is an `int` but we need to trace size operations on it in Python. So we need it to be a tensor in Python. Then we convert the tensor back to ints when they are inputs coming in through the ArgumentStash
body_html: The output of size is an int but we need to trace size operations on it in Python. So we need it to be a tensor in Python. Then we convert the tensor back to ints when they are inputs coming in through the ArgumentStash
